spice.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a type of powder or seed, taken from plants, that you put into food you are cooking to give it a special taste
spice.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: interest or excitement that is added to something
spice.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Travel adds spice to your life.
spice.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to add interest or excitement to something
spice.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Millions have bought the book to spice up their sex lives.
